title: WebQit Community
desc: Meet WebQit across developer platforms. Stay open to events happening around your favourite topics. We're welcoming early developers like you!

features.title: Github
features.desc:
- Follow webqit on github.
- Find and star your favorite WebQit project. Join the Github Discussions, report bugs make Pull Requests.

features.title: Twitter
features.desc:
- Follow @Web_Qit on twitter.
- Add to the conversation from anywhere using the hashtags #GoWebNative, #JustUseThePlatform

features.title: LinkedIn
features.desc:
- Follow WebQit, Inc. for corporate and career news.
- Engage with, and facilitate, conversations with hashtags #GoWebNative, #Opensource

features.title: DEV Community
features.desc: Join the topics around WebQit and Web-Native development. Follow, or make your own, posts with the #webqit and #webnative tags.
